snippet: Former Prime Minister Tony Blair of Britain called on European Union leaders to heed the “wake-up call” of the recent European elections by delivering better living standards.
abstract: Former British Prime Min Tony Blair calls on European Union leaders to deliver better living standards after success of populist parties in European elections, but insists influx of immigrants from Eastern Europe benefited Britain.
lead_paragraph: Former Prime Minister Tony Blair of Britain called on European Union leaders to heed the “wake-up call” of the recent European elections by delivering better living standards.

headline.main: Blair Urges E.U. Leaders to Heed Lessons of Elections
headline.print_headline: Britain: Blair Sees Lessons in Elections
